description:
Bright, clear and compact for pack-in treks or going fast and light. The Spectator Sport series is nitrogen purged for fog-free viewing and waterproof protection in a rugged, reliable package. Multi-coated optics give you maximum light transmission and crisp views.

  • Wide field of view and lower magnification are ideal for scanning open terrain
  • Roof-prism construction reduces weight and bulk
  • PermaFocus technology eliminates the need to constantly readjust
  • Nitrogen purged for fog-free viewing
  • Multi-coated optics for superior light transmission and brightness
  • BaK-4 prism glass for bright, clear, crisp viewing
  • Includes soft carrying case, neck strap, and lens cleaning cloth
name: Bushnell Spector Sport 8x32 Binoculars
